title: How to Make a Northern Spy

steps.headline: Pour the Applejack brandy into a cocktail shaker.
Pour the apple cider into the cocktail shaker.
Pour the lemon juice into the cocktail shaker.
Pour the apricot liquor into the cocktail shaker.
Fill the cocktail shaker with ice.
Top with the cava or white wine.

text: Pour the Applejack brandy into a cocktail shaker.  Pour the apple cider into the cocktail shaker.  Pour the lemon juice into the cocktail shaker.  Pour the apricot liquor into the cocktail shaker.  Fill the cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake well.  Strain into a glass.  Top with the cava or white wine.
